content:
The CLAIRE network should have a strong presence at ECAI2020.
We hope many supporters take the lead and organize workshops at the next ECAI in Santiago de Compostela.
The call for workshop proposals can be found here, with (extended) deadline Dec 6.
http://ecai2020.eu/call-for-papers/workshops/
http://ecai2020.eu/wp-content/uploads/ECAI2020-CALL-FOR-WORKSHOPS.pdf (pdf version)
Absolutely! We are also planning a CLAIRE community event at ECAI 2020 ...
